statements.select: SELECT AA.PURC_ID , AA.PURC_NO , AA.PURC_DATE , AA.PURC_TYPE , AA.CUSTOMER_ID , BB.CUSTOMER_NAME , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.CUSTOMERS BB ON AA.CUSTOMER_ID = BB.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.PURC_ID = #PURC_ID#

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ITEM_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.ITEM_ID , AA.PURC_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID , BB.PRODUCT_NAME , BB.PRODUCT_CODE , ISNULL(M1.NAME, BB.UNIT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_UNIT
, AA.PURC_PRICE , AA.PURC_QTY , AA.PURC_AMT
, dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN_ITEM AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS BB ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = BB.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON BB.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.PURC_ID = #PURC_ID# ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UBZ.PURC_TRAN ( PURC_NO, PURC_DATE, PURC_TYPE, CUSTOMER_ID, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #PURC_NO#, #PURC_DATE#, #PURC_TYPE#, #CUSTOMER_ID#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS PURC_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UBZ.PURC_TRAN SET PURC_DATE = #PURC_DATE# , PURC_TYPE = #PURC_TYPE# , CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE PURC_ID = #PURC_ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN WHERE PURC_ID = #PURC_ID#; DELETE FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN_ITEM WHERE PURC_ID = #PURC_ID#
statements.select: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(PURC_NO), #PURC_NO#+'000') AS PURC_NO FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PURC_NO LIKE #PURC_NO# + '%'
SELECT AA.PURC_ID FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN AA WHERE AA.PURC_NO = #PURC_NO#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UBZ.PURC_TRAN_ITEM ( PURC_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PURC_PRICE, PURC_QTY, PURC_AMT, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #PURC_ID#, #PRODUCT_ID#, #PURC_PRICE#, #PURC_QTY#, #PURC_AMT#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ITEM_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UBZ.PURC_TRAN SET PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID# , PURC_PRICE = #PURC_PRICE# , PURC_QTY = #PURC_QTY# , PURC_AMT = #PURC_AMT# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ITEM_ID = #ITEM_ID#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.PURC_DATE DESC, AA.PURC_ID, BB.ITEM_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.PURC_ID , AA.PURC_NO , dbo.DateCharToChar10(AA.PURC_DATE) AS PURC_DATE , ISNULL(M3.NAME, AA.PURC_TYPE) AS PURC_TYPE , AA.CUSTOMER_ID , CC.CUSTOMER_NAME , AA.REMARKS , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BB.PURC_ID ORDER BY BB.ITEM_ID) AS ITEM_NO , BB.ITEM_ID , BB.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , BB.PURC_PRICE , BB.PURC_QTY , BB.PURC_AMT , ISNULL(M1.NAME, PP.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE , ISNULL(M2.NAME, PP.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(BB.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , BB.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(BB.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , BB.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.PURC_TRAN AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN UBZ.PURC_TRAN_ITEM BB ON AA.PURC_ID = BB.PURC_ID INNER JOIN UCD.CUSTOMERS CC ON AA.CUSTOMER_ID = CC.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON BB.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON PP.CATEGORY = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'CATEGORY' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PURC_TYPE = M3.CODE AND M3.PARENT_CODE = 'PURC_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON BB.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON BB.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PURC_DATE >= #ST_PURC_DATE#
AND AA.PURC_DATE <= #ED_PURC_DATE#
AND AA.CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID#
AND BB.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
AND PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = #PRODUCT_TYPE#
AND PP.CATEGORY = #CATEGORY#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
